start.description:
You awaken inside a dim, concrete hallway. The lights above flicker violently. A low humming echoes through the walls. A cold draft crawls across your skin.

Ahead of you lies a rusted metal door. Behind you, darkness stretches endlessly.

look.response: The hallway is abandoned... but something on the ground catches your eye — a small metal object glinting in the flickering light. You pick it up.

forward.response: You push the rusted metal door — it screeches open, revealing a stairwell spiraling downward.

back.response: You step back… the darkness seems to breathe, swallowing all sound.

stairwell.description: The stairwell is drenched in shadow. Each step creaks under your weight. A red EXIT sign flickers far below, but a whisper floats from a side doorway halfway down.

down.response: You descend cautiously. The EXIT sign glows brighter… until it abruptly shuts off.

side.response: You open the side door — inside, something metallic glints on a dusty table. You take it without thinking.

listen.response: You hold still. The whisper forms words: 'Don't look behind you…'

storage_room.description: The room is cramped, filled with old broken machinery and shattered light fixtures. A foul smell leaks from a vent.

inspect vent.response: You kneel to inspect the vent — a skeletal hand suddenly drops out and lands beside you… clutching a torn journal page.

leave.response: You step back into the stairwell, shaken.

exit_hall.description: You reach a broken corridor. Emergency lights pulse red. Blood smears trail across the walls toward a collapsed section of ceiling.

help.response: Available commands: follow blood, left, right

follow blood.response: You follow the trail and notice a battered tool belt hanging from a broken pipe. You take what you can.

left.response: You turn left and hear something huge dragging metal deeper inside.

right.response: A dead-end… but a backpack slumps against the wall. Inside, you find something helpful.

collapsed_corridor.description: The ceiling has collapsed, blocking the path. But a large crack splits the wall — something shuffles inside the darkness of that narrow space.

help.response: Available commands: use crowbar, call out

use crowbar.response: You wedge the crowbar into the cracked wall — the stone gives way, revealing a hidden maintenance tunnel.

call out.response: You call into the crack… the shuffling stops… then moves rapidly toward you.

machine_room.description: You enter a massive industrial chamber filled with broken generators and hanging chains. Something metallic is breathing in the dark.

explore.response: You move between the generators — finding a glowing battery pack on the floor. You pocket it.

run.response: You sprint away — chains rattle violently behind you.

tunnel.description: The maintenance tunnel is cramped, damp, and reeks of mold. But ahead, you see a faint white light.

forward.response: You crawl toward the light… only to find a locked hatch.

back.response: You return to the collapsed corridor.

hatch.description: The hatch is sealed shut with a heavy lock. A symbol engraved on it matches the strange key you found earlier.

use key.response: You insert the strange key — the hatch unlocks with a thunderous clang. A blinding light floods the tunnel.

darkness.description: You step backward into the dark… your vision dissolves… your heartbeat slows… something cold grabs your wrist.

scream.response: Your scream is swallowed by the void.

run.response: You stumble forward — back into the hallway.

death.description:
A shadow envelops you. Your body freezes. Your vision fades to black.

You have died.

help.response: There are no commands. You are dead.

ending.description:
You crawl through the open hatch and emerge outside into a cold, moonlit forest.

The facility stands behind you, sirens wailing. Whatever was inside… is no longer your concern.

You survived.

help.response: There are no commands. You have escaped.
